reviewText:
Early Access Review

I can in no way recommend this 'game' to other people. It has a cluttered, obtrusive and just plain illogical presentation. The graphics are blurry and there's zero gameplay here, except for swimming around watching other fish and creatures and looking at sea life and other objects. It's supposed to be Zen, but you would be better off watching one of those pretty aquarium screensavers or any kind of underwater documentary really.

[Rating: 45/100]

reviewText: Early Access Review\n\nPLEASE do not buy this game. It is horrible. Made by the creators of Air Control, it is just as much of a rip off as it's predecessor. The creators have had the gall to change their name and try for another shot of scamming us out of money that could be better spent on real games. Avoid avoid avoid!

reviewText: Early Access Review\n\nNot really much of a game. Press W to move forward, mouse to move camera. That's about it.

reviewText: Early Access Review\n\nI was expecting something indepth and realistic; but what I got was a low quality arrangement of coral and anemone I could pass right through ruining the illusion of them being real, fish that looked like toys you would find in a dollar store, and a movement system that didn't let you dive nor take into account the direction you faced while you moved. I was very dissapointed in the quality and the content. Do not buy!

reviewText:
Early Access Review

Very interesting game in which you can learn a lot about the underwater inhabitants of the ocean.
High quality graphics! Excellent soothing music! The extraordinary natural beauty of the underwater world!

Очень интересная игра в которой можно много узнать о подводных обитателях океана.
Высококачественная графика! Превосходная умиротворяющая музыка! Необыкновенной красоты природа подводного мира!
